=== Example of installed system ===

'''Trusty-npae124-txt4''' and '''Trusty-nonpae-txt5''' are Ubuntu minimal systems with a non-pae kernel and text screen. It looks like the following pictures. You can install a graphical window manager or desktop environment from the installer menu.

grub menu

main text mode menu (indicating pae processor)

main menu (indicating no pae flag)

installer menu
